com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.addressbook.api.search

Class Search

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbbn.cpaas.mobile.addressbook.api.search.Search

  • public class Search
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains necessary information when **search** will be used.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Search(SearchFilter filter)
      Creates a Search criteria with given filter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Search

        public Search(SearchFilter filter)
        Creates a Search criteria with given filter. Other optional criteria can be set to this object using the setters with a builder manner.
        Parameters:
        filter - tells which keyword will be searched in the specified field type.

    • Method Detail

      • directoryId

        public Search directoryId(java.lang.String directoryId)
        Specifies which directory will be searched. **Default** value is "default".
        Parameters:
        directoryId - id of the directory to be searched

      • sortBy

        public Search sortBy(FieldType sortBy)
        Sorts result according to the specified field type. If any field type not specified, will be same with the **filter** field type in the initialization phase.
        Parameters:
        sortBy - field type to sort the results

      • order

        public Search order(SearchOrder order)
        Orders results according to the specified type. **Default** value is *ascending*.
        Parameters:
        order - order type to sort the results

      • limit

        public Search limit(int limit)
        Specifies the maximum number of contacts will return from the result. If search query has more than specified *limit*, can be check **hasNext** property of the **CPaaSSearchResult** object to get next chunk of results.
        Parameters:
        limit - maximum number of contacts will return from the result

      • getFilter

        public SearchFilter getFilter()
        Returns the search filter.
        Returns:
        SearchFilter

      • getSortBy

        public FieldType getSortBy()
        Returns the sort type.
        Returns:
        sort type

        public SearchOrder getOrder()
        Returns the search order.
        Returns:
        order

        public int getLimit()
        Returns the search limit.
        Returns:
        limit

      • getDirectoryId

        public java.lang.String getDirectoryId()
        Returns the directory ID.
        Returns:
        directory ID
